text_logic_form: Find the area of the polygon $ACBDE$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Find the area of the polygon $ACBDE$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $AC$ is $20$ units.
The length of the line $DF$ is $10$ units.
The length of the line $DE$ is $15$ units.
The length of the line $BE$ is $12$ units.
Point $F$ lies on the line connecting $A$ and $C$.
The line $DF$ is perpendicular to the line $AF$.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AC$, $AD$, $BC$, $BE$, and $DE$, forming the polygon $ACBDE$.
